data.title: Wasp by Russell, Eric Frank (Author): Good+ Hard Cover (1957) First Edition.
data.meta_description: First Edition. - Hard Cover - Avalon Books, New York, New York - 1957 - Condition: Good+ - Good+ - Gray bords with red print. 223pp. The jacket is not clipped. Some shelf lean. The book has light ink staining to the top and bottom edges of the front/rear cover, inside of the front/rear cover, top and bottom edges of the text block and to the front/rear endpapers. The staining does not interfere with the text in the book and is mostly hidden by the jacket. The jacket has a few spots of ink staining to the top and bottom edges. Light toning to the outside edge of the text block. The pages are crisp and clean and the binding it tight. Light nudging to the bottom end of the spine. Name of the previous owner on the inside of the front cover. The jacket has had a protective poly cover added. - Wasp

More Information

Shipping Terms:

We have increased our international shipping prices due to a steady rise in cost through the postal service. Apologies for any inconvenience.

Orders ship within 1-2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is especially heavy, we may need to increase your shipping charge. Please be aware, international shipping costs can be considerably high depending on destination.
